content.question: Which of the following statements best predicts the effect of increasing the permeability of the mitochondrial membranes to large molecules?

choices.label: <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> production will increase because of an increase in the rate at which proteins diffuse out of mitochondria.

<math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> production will increase because of an increase in the mixing of mitochondrial and cytosolic substances.

<math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> production will decrease because of an increase in the occurrence of uncontrolled chemical reactions.

<math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> production will decrease because of an increase in the surface area of the mitochondrial membranes.

content.answer: <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> production will decrease because of an increase in the occurrence of uncontrolled chemical reactions.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
